contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Radio station | name = XHUAR-FM | image = | city = Ciudad Juárez, Chihuahua | area = | branding = Órbita 106.7 | slogan = Rock Sin Fronteras | frequency = 106.7 [[MHz]] | airdate = | share = | share as of = | format = [[Rock En Español]]/[[News]] | erp = 100,000 [[watt]]s| | haat = | class = C | facility_id = | coordinates = | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = [[Instituto Mexicano de la Radio]] | licensee = | sister_stations = | webcast = | website = [http://www.orbita.imer.com.mx/ orbita.imer.com.mx] | | affiliations = }} '''XHUAR-FM''' ('''''Órbita 106.7''''') is a [[Rock En Español]] and [[News]] [[radio station]] licensed to [[Ciudad Juárez]], [[Chihuahua (state)|Chihuahua]], owned by IMER ([[Instituto Mexicano de la Radio]]), [[Mexico]]'s public radio network. Like the Public Radio stations in the United States, IMER presents a variety of discussion and music programs. == External links == *[http://www.orbita.imer.com.mx/ XHUAR-FM official page] *[http://www.imer.gob.mx/ IMER website] {{IMER|HUAR-FM}} {{Ciudad Juarez Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xhuar-Fm}} [[Category:Radio stations in Chihuahua]] [[Category:Media in Ciudad Juárez]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
